talents.name: Starship Adversary 1
talents.description: Upgrade difficulty of all combat checks against a ship  this character is commanding once.

talents.name: Concentrated Fire
talents.description: As an action, make an :average: Leadership check. All llies on up to 4 ships in the encounter gain :advantage::advantage: on all Gunnery checks until the beginning of Ackbar’s next turn.

talents.name: Confident Command
talents.description: Upgrade difficulty of all combat checks against a ship  this character is commanding once.

abilities.name: Zero-Gravity Maneuvers
abilities.description: In zero gravity, Alliance Fleet Troopers trat movement as being in normal terrain instead of difficult terrain.

abilities.name: Experience counts
abilities.description: Allies within short range of Andor add :boost: to Stealth and Deception checks.

abilities.name: Whatever It Takes
abilities.description: Andor may spend a maneuver to add :success::advantage: to the next combat check made by a friendly character within short range. That character suffers 3 strain.

weapons.name: BlasTech A280-CFE blaster pistol
weapons.notes: Spend a maneuver to switch between modes.

abilities.name: Human-Cyborg Relations
abilities.description: While C-3PO is translating for a character, that character removes :setback::setback: from their Charm and Negotiation checks.

abilities.name: Improved Phrasing
abilities.description: C-3PO allows player within short range to cancel :threat: or :despair: from their Charm and Negotiation checks. C-3PO then suffers 1 strain per cancelled :threat: and 4 strain per cancelled :despair:.

abilities.name: We’re Doomed!
abilities.description: C-3PO adds :setback: to the Discipline, Mechanics and Piloting checks any characters within short range make.

abilities.name: Life Debt
abilities.description: Once per encounter, Chewbacca may spend 1 Destiny Point to reroll 1 skill check when defending or aiding Han Solo.

abilities.name: Master of Repairs
abilities.description: When Chewbacca repairs system strain or hull trauma on a starship or vehicle, he repairs three additional system strain or hull trauma.

abilities.name: The Wookiee Wins
abilities.description: Chewbacca may spend :triumph: from Brawl checks to inflict the Maimed Critical Injury.

abilities.name: Wookiee Roar
abilities.description: Once per encounter, as an action Chewbacca may inflict 5 strain on all enemies within medium range.

weapons.name: Chewbacca’s bowcaster
weapons.notes: Spend a maneuver to load a specialized quarrel that adds either Blast 5, Breach 1, Concussive 1, Disorient 2, Ion or Vicious 4 to the next attack using bowcaster.

talents.name: Hold Together
talents.description: Spend 1 Destiny Point to, immediately after vehicle or starship takes damage, turn it into system strain.

abilities.name: Impulsive Distraction
abilities.description: Once per encounter, Han may spend an action to allow all allies in the encounter to add automatic :success: to their next skill check that round.

abilities.name: Never Tell Me The Odds
abilities.description: Once per session, after assembling the dice pool for a check but before rolling, Han may suffer up to 3 strain to remove an equal amount of negative dice from the pool.

weapons.name: Han’s heavy blaster
weapons.notes: Once per round, as a maneuver Han may upgrade the difficulty of the next attack with this weapon once to gain Pierce 7 on that attack. GM may spend :despair: or :threat::threat: on the check to have it run out of ammo.

abilities.name: Takes advantage
abilities.description: Jyn needs one fewer :advantage: to activate an item quality, to a minimum of one.

abilities.name: While They’re Down
abilities.description: Allies add :advantage::advantage: to Melee checks made against prone or disoriented targets engaged with Jyn.

name: K-2SO

abilities.name: Brutal Honesty
abilities.description: K-2SO adds :setback::setback: to allies’ social skill checks within short range.

gear: Built-in comms package with communications booster

abilities.name: Idiot’s Array
abilities.description: Once per encounter, may turn :triumph: from another character’s skill check related to a game of chance into :despair:.

abilities.name: Prehensile Feet
abilities.description: Can move along vertical surfaces as if they were horizontal.

abilities.name: Honour Guard Training
abilities.description: When making a brawl of melee attack, Knockdown costs one less :advantage:.

weapons.name: Bo-rifle ranged
weapons.notes: Bo-rifle takes a maneuver to switch between profiles

weapons.name: Bo-rifle melee
weapons.notes: Bo-rifle takes a maneuver to switch between profiles

name: Leia Organa
description: The Alderaanian princess is already well known to be as out-spoken and politically savvy as her famous father. Although she is very young to hold a position of power as great as that of an Imperial Senator, she has had a lifetime of training for the role. She embodies all of Alderaan’s values and strengths, along with Bail Organa’s political skill and desire to bring an end to the Emperor and Empire. She actively users her diplomatic status to support resistance activities, whether for recruitment, acquisition of supplies, delivery of information, or even to personally join a fight when necessary.

abilities.name: Improved Take Charge
abilities.description: When making a skill check, Princess Leia may spend :advantage: to let one ally within Medium range immediately perform a maneuver as an out of turn incidental. She may instead spend :triumph: or :advantage::advantage::advantage: to let all allies within Medium range perform a maneuver as an out of turn incidental instead.

talents.name: Exhaust Port
talents.description: Before attacking a starship or vehicle, Luke may spend 1 Destiny Point to ignore the effects of the Massive rule for the attack.

abilities.name: One In A Million
abilities.description: Luke may spend 1 Destiny Point to add :success::success:, :advantage::advantage: or :success::advantage: to any combat check he makes.
